results.title: Preventive and therapeutic effect of simvastatin on secondary inflammatory damage of rats with cerebral hemorrhage.
results.text_hl: Preventive and therapeutic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on secondary @<m>DISEASE_Systemic_Inflammatory_Response_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018746 @@@inflammatory damage@@@ of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@cerebral hemorrhage@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhou HX, Gao LH, Meng LL, Zhang YX, Wei ZF, Si DW. Preventive and therapeutic effect of simvastatin on secondary inflammatory damage of rats with cerebral hemorrhage. Asian Pac J Trop Med. 2017 Feb;10(2):152-156. PMID: 28237480

results.title: Simvastatin prevents 1-methyl-4-phenyl-1,2,3,6-tetrahydropyridine-induced striatal dopamine depletion and protein tyrosine nitration in mice.
results.text_hl: The results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibits the formation of @GENE_TNF @GENE_21926 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Peroxynitrous_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D030421 @@@peroxynitrite@@@ in activated microglia thereby protecting @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@dopaminergic neurons@@@ from @<m>DISEASE_Systemic_Inflammatory_Response_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018746 @@@inflammatory damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Selley ML. Simvastatin prevents 1-methyl-4-phenyl-1,2,3,6-tetrahydropyridine-induced striatal dopamine depletion and protein tyrosine nitration in mice. Brain Res. 2005 Mar 10;1037(1-2):1-6. PMID: 15777746
